doc.after: For effectively retrieving relevant documents by IR strategies the documents are typically transformed into a suitable representation Each retrieval strategy incorporates a specific model for its document representation purposes The picture on the right illustrates the relationship of some common models In the picture the models are categorized according to two dimensions the mathematical basis and the properties of the model
